subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Boatwright made two free throws with 7.9 seconds to play and blocked a 3-point attempt at the buzzer as No. 18 Connecticut beat Boston College, 72-70.
snippet: Ryan Boatwright made two free throws with 7.9 seconds to play and blocked a 3-point attempt at the buzzer as No. 18 Connecticut beat Boston College, 72-70.
